# Undetectable Alignment (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature or object

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (object)

**Spell Resistance** Yes (object)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 363

An *undetectable alignment* spell conceals the alignment of an object or a creature from all forms of divination.

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 2 to Level per *Dungeon Master's Guide*.
